availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John James Orr (County Attorney, Carroll County)

body.p: Born in Ghent, Carroll County, Kentucky. Son of J.B. Orr and Eliza Scott. Resided in Ghent, Carroll County. Graduated from the Law Department of the University of Kentucky and admitted to the bar in 1857. Three times County Attorney of Carroll County. Married Rowena Sanders. Father of Emmett Orr, Mrs. George S. Lee, T. Sanders Orr, and Mrs. W.E. Cless.

bibl.p: Find A Grave, Entry for Judge John James Orr (1832-1909), Find A Grave Memorial # 22773786, Ghent Masonic Cemetery, Ghent, Carroll County, Kentucky, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GSln=OR&GSpartial=1&GSbyrel=all&GSst=19&GScntry=4&GSsr=1041&GRid=22773786& (accessed 7 May 2017).
